title: "Altos Computing announces Altos BrainSphereTM R685 F5 Server powered by NVIDIA RTX A6000 GPU to support AI/DL computing workloads and simulation"
excerpt: "Altos Computing today announced its new NVIDIA®-Certified server Altos BrainSphereTM R685 F5, which is equipped with two AMD EPYCTM 7763 CPUs, two NVIDIA ConnectX®-6 network adapters and four NVIDIA RTXTM A6000 GPUs based on the NVIDIA Ampere architecture."
